participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and caring, he enjoys connecting with others and supports his friends and family.
participant_1.background: I cherish my favorite pair of running shoes. I am very skinny and energetic. I like Lightning McQueen. I spend most of my time working, but I make time for my friends and family when I can. I work at a non-profit that helps children.

participant_2.name: Sara
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, she finds joy in music and stays positive despite challenges.
participant_2.background: I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time. I don't care much about the weather, as long as my dog is happy. I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments! I had to learn how to cook without shrimp because of my shellfish allergy. I will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.

content.text: Hello! I'm a pretty energetic person. What about you?
Hey there! I'm pretty energetic too, but I'm on bed rest for the next 5 months so I'm just trying to stay positive!
Oh no! I'm so sorry! What happened?
I got in a car accident. I'm lucky to be alive!
Well I'm glad you're still here! How are you feeling?
I'm in a lot of pain, but I'm doing okay.
Well I'm here for you if you need anything.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, I'm a musician.
Oh that's awesome! I like to play music too!
What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and I sing.
That's really cool! I play the guitar and I sing too!
Oh no way! That's so awesome!
That would be so much fun!
Great! I'll send you my number.
